## DefaultSequence.invokeMiddleware property

Optional invoker for registered middleware in a chain. To be injected via SequenceActions.INVOKE\_MIDDLEWARE.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected invokeMiddleware: InvokeMiddleware;
```
